name: O-Neir-I ~ Physics based Puzzle Platformer (Early 'Demo')
description:
O-Neir-I (OH-NEER-IE) is a physics-based first person puzzle game. Fire cuboids through energy fields to alter their properties and advance through a myriad of hand-crafted levels.

The Cube:

The Cube is a mysterious artifact that you find early in the game, no one knows it's origin or how it came to be but once you pick up the cube, you are given the ability to shoot an endless amount of cubes and will need to use these cubes in order to traverse the levels in the game, to place it back upon it's true resting place.

This is the first truly playable build of the game and we would love your feedback on what you think works well and what doesn't.

Alot of the gameplay ideas are still very basic/undeveloped but we feel that there is enough (unpolished) content here for players to sink their teeth into and try to get  the feel of the game and maybe even appreciate the tone we are attempting to set.

Although we don't really plan on developing the game further we would still love to hear what you think and maybe we would consider spending a bit more time with it if only for completeness sake.

Thanks for giving it a try!!
